急性损伤后解锁肝脏再生的谷氨酸钥匙肝脏是重要的器官，对消化，代谢和消除毒素至关重要。它具有独特的能力和再生能力，可以替代这些细胞消除的毒素破坏的肝细胞。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250326/glutamate-key-to-unlocking-liver-nocking-liver-regeneration-river-regeneration-after-ucute-damage.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250326/glutamate-key-to-unlocking-liver-nocking-liver-regeneration-regeneration-regeneration-regeneration-after-ucute-damage.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d8a8888cf5-efb1-4e82-91aa-91aa-9fdddd334ec49c Wed, 26 Mar 2025 22:56:21 -0400 Glutamate key to unlocking liver regeneration after acute damage
